summary: This mod brings to Skyrim Cole's MacGrath powers from Infamous 2!
descriptionHtml:
----------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------Infamous 2 Powers in Skyrim---------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------


IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT:
Hello! 
Unfortunately, this mod will not continue being developed due to lack of time. I'm sorry for that.
As I can't continue with it, from now on: 

1) Anyone has permission to use the files of this mod to create his own mod, and upload it to Steam Workshop or Nexus. 

2) If that is the case, please, add my name to your mod's description as a form of credit to my work. This is not mandatory, but I'll thank you if you do so.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


This mod aims to bring all Cole MacGrath's powers from Infamous 2.

----.:CONTENT:.----

SPELLS
-Alpha Bolt- a single shock ball, pure and simple. Good and evil versions.
-Artillery Bolt- powerful lightning ball. Good and evil versions.
-Magnum Bolt- very powerful ray. Just good version.
-Bolt Stream- a stream of bolts. Just good version.
-Alpha Blast- a blast that pushes enemies away and deals a bit of damage.
Just good version.
-Alpha Grenade- a lightning ball that is affected by gravity and explodes
when it touches the ground. Good and evil versions.
-Skull Bolt- A very powerful variation of the Alpha Bolt that explodes on
enemies.
-Frost Shield- A block of ice that protects from magic attacks.
-Alpha Rocket- a pretty powerful lightning explosive ball that looks like
a rocket.

EXTRAS
-The Conduit race: with more of health, magicka and stamina.

----.:TO-DO LIST:.----

Note: this is the version 1.0, the first one, so only has 6 spells and an
extra (the conduit race). There is a lot of work to be done yet. I have
planned to do:
-The rest of Cole's Powers +improve them
-The AMP (Cole's Weapon)
-A full line of quests for the mod

---.:HOW TO INSTALL:.---

Just copy all the files into:
C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimData

---.:FAQ:.---
Q.Where do I get the powers?
A.The powers are the default spells for the Conduit Race. Also, there is a
chest in front of Riverwood with the spells.

Q.How can I help in the depelopment of this mod?
A. Go here: http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1839065-infamous-2-powers-in-skyrim-mod-help/
And post your ideas. I am not a modding expert, and to finish this mod I
need your help. You can help me more if you know how to use Creation kit, papyrus Scripting, etc.

---.:VERSION HISTORY:.---

-Version 1.0 -First release-
+ Added Alpha bolt
+ Added Artillery Bolt
+ Added Magnum Bolt
+ Added Boltstream
+ Added Alpha Blast
+ Added Alpha Grenade
+ Added the Conduit race.

-Version 1.1
+ Added Skull Bolt
+ Added dual casting on most powers
+ Graphical improvements
+ Minor changes

-Version 1.15
+ Added dual cast for Skull Bolt

-Version 1.2
+ Added the Alpha Rocket
+ Added the Frost Shield
+ Graphic improvements

---.:CREDITS:.---

Original creator: Zymoox
Thanks Enaisiaion for creating Mdias Magic mod, which I have learnt a lot from it.
Thanks kurosakidude for good ideas.

Skyrim Steam Workshop link http: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=283700792


Enjoy the mod :)
author: Zymoox
